Parameters: PorterDuff.Mode: The porter-duff mode that is applied
PorterDuffXfermode(android.graphics.Port.Description: Create an xfermode that uses the specified porter-duff mode.

ClassDesc: Specialized implementation of @B_android#graphics#Paint_E@'s @B_android#graphics#Paint#setXfermode_E@. Refer to the documentation of the @B_android#graphics#PorterDuff#Mode_E@ enum for more information on the available alpha compositing and blending modes.
